Blog

    08 Mar 2015

    First!

    Hello and welcome to the first blog post. This blog will be covering programming topics such as personal projects, online projects and things learnt from my Computer Science course.

    For technical details about the site, it is running on Github Pages, which allows free web hosting. It includes integration with Jekyll which implements an easy way to blog, the ability to set common layouts between pages as well as the capabliity to build/preview website locally and more. Otherwise, the website is based on HTML/CSS. For the full source code, click here. If there's any bugs/problems with the site, don't be afraid to let me know!

Hosted on GitHub Pages — Based off theme by orderedlist
